snippet: Merrill Newman, the Korean War veteran detained by the North Korean government, said he was kept under guard in a hotel.
abstract: Merrill Newman, Korean War veteran detained by the North Korean government, recants confession made while in captivity, saying it was given under duress; describes being threatened with 15-year jail sentence while under guard in a hotel.
lead_paragraph: Merrill Newman, the Korean War veteran detained by the North Korean government, said he was kept under guard in a hotel.
